title: Abandoned
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Charles J. Rosenbloom
provenance_text:
Roger Dudant [1929-2008], Peruwelz, Belgium, until October 1955 [1]; acquired by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1955.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 84 in "The 1955 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting" held at Carnegie Institute, October-December 1955. 
[2]. The painting was purchased from the International for Carnegie Institute with funds provided by Mr. and Mrs. Charles J. Rosenbloom, Pittsburgh, PA.
